          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of hydrogen chloride molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung der Wasserstoffchlorverbindung 
Moleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation des molécules de chlorure 
d'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação de moléculas do cloreto de 
hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione delle molecole dell'acido cloridrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός των μορίων υδροχλωρίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de las moléculas del cloruro de 
hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the reaction between a hydrogen molecule and a chlorine molecule producing two hydrogen chloride molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Reaktion 
zwischen einem Wasserstoffmolekül und einem Chlormolekül, zwei 
Wasserstoffchlorverbindung Moleküle produzierend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre la réaction entre une 
molécule d'hydrogène et une molécule de chlore produisant deux 
molécules de chlorure d'hydrogène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a reação entre uma 
molécula do hidrogênio e uma molécula do cloro produzindo duas 
moléculas do cloreto de hidrogênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra la reazione fra una 
molecola dell'idrogeno e una molecola del cloro producendo due 
molecole dell'acido cloridrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί την αντίδραση μεταξύ ενός
μορίου υδρογόνου και ενός μορίου χλωρίου παράγοντας δύο μόρια 
υδροχλωρίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la reacción entre una 
molécula del hidrógeno y una molécula de la clorina produciendo dos
moléculas del cloruro de hidrógeno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
